summary: Nezumi - Nezumi is the Japanese embodiment of Mickey Mouse, celebrated for his irresistible charm and boundless energy. With his iconic large ears and sparkling eyes, Nezumi epitomizes Japan's unique aesthetic, blending elegance with profound mystery. He navigates the streets of Tokyo and captivates audiences in Kyoto's ancient theaters, his adventures echoing the graceful dance of cherry blossoms in the spring breeze, forever vibrant.
